name: vscode-rke-cluster-config
description: VSCode extension for RKE cluster configuration

scripts.schema: go run dump_cluster_config_schema.go && jq -c 'walk(if type == "object" and has("$schema") then del(.["$schema"]) else . end)'  < ./schemas/cluster.yml.json|jq . > tmp.json && mv tmp.json ./schemas/cluster.yml.json && jq -c 'walk(if type == "object" and has("$schema") then del(.["$schema"]) else . end)'  < ./schemas/cluster.json|jq . > tmp.json && mv tmp.json ./schemas/cluster.json

author: Dan Čermák <dcermak@suse.com>
